actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 104-34.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 57.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to establish the Carl Garner Federal Lands Cleanup Day, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Lands Cleanup Act of 1985 to rename Federal Lands Cleanup Day or Federal Lands National Cleanup Day as Carl Garner Federal Lands Cleanup Day.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Carl Garner Federal Lands Cleanup Day, and for other purposes.
